original: intros net. unfold deghost, reghost. destruct net as [nwPackets nwState]. f_equal. - unfold ghost_packet, deghost_packet. rewrite map_map. apply map_ext. intros. destruct a as [p d]. simpl. now rewrite ghost_deghost_packet. - apply functional_extensionality. intros. destruct (nwState x) as [p d'] eqn: eq_state. now destruct (decide (p = ghost_init)).
